meaningMnemonic: Remember how 忘れる is "to <kanji>forget</kanji>"? Well, a <kanji>thing</kanji> you've forgotten is a <vocabulary>forgotten item</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You didn't learn this reading with the kanji 忘, but you did learn it with the vocabulary 忘れる.  What <reading>was</reading> (わす) that reading again? You can't remember! It's become a <vocabulary>forgotten item</vocabulary>!
